content:
{"name": "The Salvation Army Conner Creek Corps & Community Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "****Weekly Food Distribution****

We host food distribution events every Monday, from 11:30am until everything has been disributed.  Offering fresh, nutritious, and shelf-stable food items to support households of all sizes. Distributions occur rain or shine, except during severe weather conditions or on holidays.

**Emergency Food Boxes**

We understand that unexpected hardships can arise.On Tues- Friday our emergency food boxes are available to assist individuals and families in urgent need of immediate support. These boxes contain essential items to help bridge the gap during challenging times.", "email": "", "url": "https://centralusa.salvationarmy.org/connercreek/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2900 Conner Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Detroit", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48215", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3797377, "longitude": -82.9645745}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 822-2800", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
